name: Sir, Your Child!
description:
Sir! You're child is out of control!!!!

Finish your grocery list to make your parents proud of you before your child destroys the store!

Use e to interact with items and put them in your cart. Bring everything to the cashier before the timer runs out!  Pick up your out of control child to make him stop destroying aisles! You'll also need to bring him to the checkout, you  can't leave them in the store(as much as you may want to).

made for the Game makers toolkit gamejam 2020. 

made by Vincent M and Gary L
